chapters.title: Prologue: Distinctions
chapters.info: Sergeant Jargen, p. 47—Sergeant of the watch in Kandor. He wears a forked beard like most Kandori. His black hair is dusted with gray. He joined the Blightwatch the day after his fourteenth nameday. He wears a cord around his shoulder with a knot for every Trolloc he has killed. The cord has about fifty knots in it.
